body: Natural Features & Ecosystems         NPS Photo  Cave and Karst Systems Learn more about some of the area cave systems.        NPS Photo  Forests Explore the features of the forests of the Black Hills.      Groundwater Find out what it is and how important it is.        Gary Chancey, Black Hills National Forest  Soils Explore the relationship between rocks, soil and life in the Black Hills.
title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Natural Features & Ecosystems
